Class Combo

java.lang.Object
com.example.model.MenuItem
com.example.model.Combo
public class Combo extends MenuItem
Represents a combo meal consisting of a sandwich, beverage, and side. Combos receive a special rate discount applied to the sandwich price.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final double
    COMBO_RATE
    Special rate discount applied to combos ($2 off total price).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Combo meal with specified components.

  • Field Details

    • COMBO_RATE

      public static final double COMBO_RATE
      Special rate discount applied to combos ($2 off total price).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • Combo

      public Combo(Sandwich sandwich, Beverage drink, Side side, int quantity)
      Constructs a new Combo meal with specified components.
      Parameters:
      sandwich - the sandwich included in the combo
      drink - the beverage included in the combo
      side - the side dish included in the combo
      quantity - the number of combo meals ordered

  • Method Details

    • price

      public double price()
      Calculates the total price for the combo meal. Applies the combo rate discount to the sandwich price. Note: Beverage and side prices are not included in the combo price.
      Specified by:
      price in class MenuItem
      Returns:
      total price for the combo order

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a formatted string representation of the combo meal. Format: "Combo[quantity][Sandwich ingredients][Beverage, Side][total price]" Example: "Combo[1][Sandwich[WHEAT_BREAD, SALMON][AVOCADO]][COLA, SMALL, ONION_RINGS]$12.99"
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      formatted string with combo details and price
